name: How The Gronch Stole Christmas
description:
How The Gronch Stole Christmas!

Our submission for the Lincoln Game Dev Winter Jam, where the theme was Christmas!

Grinch who? We only know the Gronch over here! Take control of him and Mox to steal as many presents as you can! Lets hope the presents you steal are expensive, because it'll affect your score!

Controls

Space Bar: All Controls! (Drop the Gronch!)

Credit

All programming and art done by myself and @HLeitch

Music & Audio - Zapsplat.com
